roleset.name: give a name, assign a designation to
roleset.note: DENOMINATION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia for unification. (from denomination.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: Because [the funds ' investments]-1 are denominated [*-1]in foreign currencies , their value expressed [*] in dollars goes up when those currencies rise against the dollar [*T*-2] .

example.name: Red Pants. Did I mention I love ULA corpus?
example.text: From a lifetime of undisciplined reading with innocent pencil in hand and malice prepense in mind , I have gleaned a harvest of what-2 I-1 am pleased *PRO*-1 to denominate *trace*-2 Red Pants items , a sampling of which follows .
example.arg: Red Pants items, a sampling of which follows

example.name: denomination-n
example.text: Machu Picchu: Worth its denomination as marvel of the world
example.arg: as a marvel of the world
